title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: Should I Minimize The Relationship With My Mom?
description:
Josie’s therapist has suggested the choice is hers to have a relationship with her mother or not. She’s considering a minimal one but is unsure how to “navigate the waters” doing so. - Dr. Laura: "Acceptance means you stop fighting the reality."

Are you unable to accept the realities in your life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
